message.body: Hiya. Busy day! Did you have a nice weekend?
Yeah, it was good. It is a busy day! How about yours?
Weekend was nice. I took a looooong bike ride yesterday, fun but I overdid it a bit
Sorry i took sooo long to respond, where do you ride yr bike?
Don't ride too often these days, but I biked out the river trail to valley forge with a friend
I know some people who've done it, not done it myself tho
It's more or less flat the whole way but definitely a commitment. Gotta take it slow
I don't have a bike at the moment :( but it sounds nice
My friend is training for a 10-day bike trip - 100 miles a day, camp at night. Not sure if that sounds like fun or torture
Must feel like a great accomplishment when you're done ...
It's like 8-9 hours solid biking every day. My legs are sore just imagining it
:) haha, me too! I think day 2 would be the worst
